MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​FunctionMemberDescriptorBase
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​BasicDescriptors.​IOverloadableMemberDescriptor
public abstract
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​FunctionMemberDescriptorBase
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​MethodMemberDescriptor
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​ObjectCallbackMemberDescriptor
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​StandardDescriptors.​HardwiredDescriptors.​HardwiredMethodMemberDescriptor

Class providing easier marshalling of CLR functions

Properties
IsStatic
public bool IsStatic { get; private set }

Gets a value indicating whether the described method is static.

Name
public string Name { get; private set }

Gets the name of the described method

SortDiscriminant
public string SortDiscriminant { get; private set }

Gets a sort discriminant to give consistent overload resolution matching in case of perfectly equal scores

Parameters
public ParameterDescriptor[] Parameters { get; private set }

Gets the type of the arguments of the underlying CLR function

ExtensionMethodType
public Type ExtensionMethodType { get; private set }

Gets the type which this extension method extends, null if this is not an extension method.

VarArgsArrayType
public Type VarArgsArrayType { get; private set }

Gets a value indicating the type of the ParamArray parameter of a var-args function. If the function is not var-args, null is returned.

VarArgsElementType
public Type VarArgsElementType { get; private set }

Gets a value indicating the type of the elements of the ParamArray parameter of a var-args function. If the function is not var-args, null is returned.

object obj,

)

Builds the argument list.

Parameters

The script.

obj
object

The object.

context
ScriptExecutionContext

The context.

args
CallbackArguments

The arguments.

outParams
out List<int>

Output: A list containing the indices of all "out" parameters, or null if no out parameters are specified.

BuildReturnValue
protected static DynValue BuildReturnValue(
Script script,
List<int> outParams,
object[] pars,
object retv
)

Builds the return value of a call

Parameters
script
Script

The script.

outParams
List<int>

The out parameters indices, or null. See BuildArgumentList.

pars
object[]

The parameters passed to the function.

retv
object

The return value from the function. Use DynValue.Void if the function returned no value.

Returns

A DynValue to be returned to scripts
